price: (سرووشتی) ئینسان وایە لەسەر پەلەکردن بەدی ھێنراوە بەزوویی تۆڵەی خۆمتان نیشان دەدەم کەواتە پەلە مەکەن
arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِنۡ عَجَلٖۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: khuliqa al-insānu min ʿajalin sa-urīkum āyātī falā tastaʿjilūni
